name: portifi_ai
description: Portifi AI is a full-stack web application that allows users to upload their resume and automatically generate a personalized portfolio website using AI.   Each user receives a unique public link to share their portfolio with recruiters and companies.

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push
